issue.title: [R] Remove warning about factor conversion to string in if_else()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14659](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14659). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13358 added support for factors in the `if_else()` and `ifelse()` functions but we did not remove the warning message saying that factors are currently converted to strings (which is no longer true). Remove the warning and modify the test that has a comment referring to ARROW-13358.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14659?focusedCommentId=17450771) by Ian Cook (icook):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11794
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11794>
